title: Italy seizes Russian billionaire Melnichenko's Sailing Yacht A
description: Italian police have seized a superyacht owned by Russian billionaire Andrey Igorevich Melnichenko, the prime minister's office said on Saturday, a few days after the businessman was placed on an EU sanctions list following Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
content: BERGAMO, Italy, March 12 (Reuters) - Italian police have seized a superyacht owned by Russian billionaire Andrey Igorevich Melnichenko, the prime minister's office said on Saturday, a few days after â€¦ [+2960 chars]
